title: Website Down
description: The website is not accessible from multiple locations.

title: Login Issue
description: Unable to login to the user account, password reset not working.

title: Payment Gateway Error
description: The payment gateway fails during transaction completion.

title: Page Load Time
description: The homepage is taking too long to load.

title: Error 404
description: User encounters a 404 error when trying to access the profile page.

title: Broken Image Links
description: Several image links on the website are broken and need to be fixed.

title: Server Overload
description: The server is experiencing high traffic and going down intermittently.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Customer requests a dark mode feature for the website.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: The mobile app crashes when attempting to open the dashboard.

title: UI Bug on Checkout Page
description: A bug causes misalignment of checkout elements on the screen.
